com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.explorer
Class ExplorerSupport

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.tools.visualvm.core.explorer.ExplorerSupport

public final class ExplorerSupport
extends Object

Class for accessing the explorer tree.

Author:
Jiri Sedlacek

Method Summary
 void addExpansionListener(ExplorerExpansionListener listener)
          Adds a listener to receive notifications about expanded/collapsed explorer tree nodes.
 void addSelectionListener(ExplorerSelectionListener listener)
          Adds a listener to receive notifications about explorer tree selection change.
 void clearSelection()
          Clears selection of explorer tree.
 void collapseDataSource(DataSource dataSource)
          Collapses DataSource if displayed and expanded in explorer tree.
 void expandDataSource(DataSource dataSource)
          Expands DataSource if displayed and collapsed in explorer tree.
 int getDataSourcePosition(DataSource dataSource)
          Returns current DataSource position within its owner DataSource in explorer tree or -1 if the position cannot be determined.
 Set<DataSource> getSelectedDataSources()
          Returns selected DataSources in explorer tree.
 void removeExpansionListener(ExplorerExpansionListener listener)
          Removes explorer tree expansion listener.
 void removeSelectionListener(ExplorerSelectionListener listener)
          Removes explorer tree selection listener.
 void selectDataSource(DataSource dataSource)
          Selects DataSource in explorer tree.
 void selectDataSources(Set<DataSource> dataSources)
          Selects multiple DataSources in explorer tree.
static ExplorerSupport sharedInstance()
          Returns singleton instance of ExplorerSupport.

getDataSourcePosition

public int getDataSourcePosition(DataSource dataSource)
Returns current DataSource position within its owner DataSource in explorer tree or -1 if the position cannot be determined.

current DataSource position within its owner DataSource in explorer tree or -1 if the position cannot be determined.
